DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of a person's race.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._An arbitrary classification of taxonomic group that is a division of a species; usually arise as a consequence of geographical isolation within a species and characterised by shared heredity, physical attributes and behavior, and in case of humans, by common history, nationality, or geographic distribution.

Concepts.definition: A human being.

Property.preferredDefinition: An arbitrary classification of taxonomic group that is a division of a species; usually arise as a consequence of geographical isolation within a species and characterised by shared heredity, physical attributes and behavior, and in case of humans, by common history, nationality, or geographic distribution.

Concepts.definition: A geographic ancestral origin category that is assigned to a population group based mainly on physical characteristics that are thought to be distinct and inherent.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 8/29/13mn-versioned DEC due to conceptual domain. changed from UML Default CD to Property or Attribute.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An arbitrary classification of a taxonomic group that is a division of a species.  It usually arises as a consequence of geographical isolation within a species and is characterized by shared heredity, physical attributes and behavior, and in the case of humans, by common history, nationality, or geographic distribution._Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: African American; term used in the United States to categorize a population group comprised of persons having origins in any of the black racial groups of Africa, most of whose ancestors were brought from Africa to the Americas as slaves between the sixteenth and nineteenth centuries. Includes population subgroups, e.g. Kenyan, Nigerian, or Haitian. The concept refers also to individuals who classify themselves as described.

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the Black racial groups of Africa. Terms such as "Haitian" or "Negro" can be used in addition to "Black or African American". (OMB)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person with African ancestral origins who self identifies, or is identified, as African. The concept does not refer to those of other ancestry, for example, European and South Asian. In practice, the term mainly refers to people originated from forty-eight sub-Saharan Africa nations; and excudes individuals from North Africa countries, e.g. such as Algeria, Morocco, Egypt, Tunisia with Arab and Berber ethnicity.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person with ancestral origins are in any of the countries of Africa.

PermissibleValues.value: American Indian, South or Central America

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person having origins in one of the indigenous people of South or Central America such as Mayans or Incas.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person having origins in one of the indigenous people of South or Central America such as Mayans or Incas.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The indigenous people of  Alaska and their descendants.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person having origins in any indigenous people of Alaska and their descendants and who maintains tribal affiliation, or community or cultural attachment. The concept refers to population subgroups such as Eskimos, Aleuts, Inupiat, Yupik, Alutiiq, Egegik,and Pribilovian, Alaskan Athabascan, Tlingit, and Haida. The concept refers also to individuals who classify themselves as such.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person having origins in one of the indigenous peoples of North America, who lived on the continent prior to the European colonization. The term includes individuals belonging to a large number of tribes, states, and ethnic groups, many of them still enduring as communities.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person having origins in one of the indigenous peoples of North America, who lived on the continent prior to the European colonization. The term includes individuals belonging to a large number of tribes, states, and ethnic groups, many of them still enduring as communities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person of African ancestral origins whose family settled in the Caribbean region.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person of African ancestral origins whose family settled in the Caribbean region.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person having origins in one of the indigenous people of the Caribbean.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person having origins in one of the indigenous people of the Caribbean.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Used to indicate when a respondent makes a decision to not answer a question.

Concepts.definition: Used to indicate when a respondent makes a decision to not answer a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person having origins in any of the countries of Eastern Europe such as Czechoslovakia, Poland, Croatia, Hungary, Slovenia, Former Soviet Union, or Finland. It also includes persons who call themselves Gypsies from this region.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person having origins in any of the countries of Eastern Europe such as Czechoslovakia, Poland, Croatia, Hungary, Slovenia, Former Soviet Union, or Finland. It also includes persons who call themselves Gypsies from this region.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person having origins in the Philippine Islands.

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Philippine Islands.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person from Guam or of that ancestry.

Concepts.definition: Denotes the inhabitants of Guam, a person from there, or their descendants elsewhere.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii.

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Japan.

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Japan..

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Korea.

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Korea.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person having origins in a country such as  Italy, Greece, Romania, Turkey, and Bulgaria.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person having origins in any of the countries abutting the Mediterranean Sea, principally those of Europe.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person having origins in the region of southwest Asia, between the India subcontinent and Europe, including Kuwait, Turkey, Lebanon, Israel, Iraq, Iran, Jordan, Saudi Arabia, lands east of Pakistan or the other countries of the Arabian Peninsula.  Also includes people of Jewish ethnicity including Sephardic and Ashkenazic.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person having origins in the region of southwest Asia, between the India subcontinent and Europe, including Kuwait, Turkey, Lebanon, Israel, Iraq, Iran, Jordan, Saudi Arabia, lands east of Pakistan or the other countries of the Arabian Peninsula.  Also includes people of Jewish ethnicity including Sephardic and Ashkenazic.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person of European, Middle Eastern, or North African ancestral origins whose family settled in a North American country such as the United States of America or Canada.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person of European, Middle Eastern, or North African ancestral origins whose family settled in a North American country such as the United States of America or Canada.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person having origins in a northern country of Africa such as Egypt, Sudan, Libya, Algeria, Morocco, or Tunisia.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person having origins in a northern country of Africa such as Egypt, Sudan, Libya, Algeria, Morocco, or Tunisia.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of China.

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of China.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person having origins in any of the countries of northern Europe such as Belgium, Denmark, Austria, Switzerland, Norway, Sweden, or Great Britain.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person having origins in any of the countries of northern Europe such as Belgium, Denmark, Austria, Switzerland, Norway, Sweden, or Great Britain.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person from Samoa or of that ancestry.

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Samoa.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person having origins in any of the black  racial groups of Africa whose family settled in a South or Central  American country such as Argentina, Brazil, and Mexico.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person having origins in any of the black racial groups of Africa whose family settled in a South or Central American country such as Argentina, Brazil, or Mexico.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Vietnam.

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Viet Nam.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person with European, Middle Eastern, or North African ancestral origin whose family settled in the Caribbean region.

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in the Caribbean region who identifies as white.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person having origins in any of the countries of Western Europe such as Spain, Portugal, or France.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person having origins in any of the countries of Western Europe such as Spain, Portugal, or France.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person of European ancestral origins whose family settled in a South or Central American country such as Argentina, Brazil, or Mexico.

Concepts.definition: A person having origins in the any of the countries of South America or Central America who identifies as white.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Denotes a person whose ancestry is in the countries of the Indian sub-continent, including India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, and Sri Lanka.

Concepts.definition: Denotes a person whose ancestry is in the countries of the Indian sub-continent, including India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, and Sri Lanka.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Other Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Other Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.: Denotes a person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. The term covers particularly people who identify themselves as part-Hawaiian, Native Hawaiian, Guamanian or Chamorro, Carolinian, Samoan, Chuukese (Trukese), Fijian, Kosraean, Melanesian, Micronesian, Northern Mariana Islander, Palauan, Papua New Guinean, Pohnpeian, Polynesian, Solomon Islander, Tahitian, Tokelauan, Tongan, Yapese, or Pacific Islander, not specified.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.longName: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
Concepts.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands. (OMB)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.: The ordinal direction halfway between south and east.: Denotes a person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent, including Cambodia, China, India, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Mongolia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands, Thailand, and Vietnam.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
The ordinal direction halfway between south and east.

A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent, including for example, Cambodia, China, India, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands, Thailand, and Vietnam. (OMB)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.: A person with European, Middle Eastern, or North African ancestral origin who identifies, or is identified, as White. The term also refers to individuals who classify themselves as described below. The term has served to distinguish the ethnic group from other groups with skin of other colours, and hence originally derives from the concept of race, but is used as indicator of ethnicity. Sometimes the term European is used, or, in terms of racial classifications, the term Caucasian or Caucasoid, coined by Blumenbach in 18th century for Indo-Europeans.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa. (OMB)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.: A person having origins in the original peoples of sub-Saharan Africa or the Caribbean.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
A person having origins in the original peoples of sub-Saharan Africa or the Caribbean.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Major living subspecies of man differentiated by genetic and physical characteristics. There are four racial groups: Australoid, Caucasoid, Mongoloid, and Negroid.:Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: A geographic ancestral origin category that is assigned to a population group based mainly on physical characteristics that are thought to be distinct and inherent.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
